radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild nodularity in the left base suggests possible small airways disease. No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion. Normal hepatic, pancreatic, splenic, and adrenal findings. Bilateral renal hypodensities consistent with cysts. Diverticulosis of the sigmoid colon without evidence of wall thickening. The appendix is dilated, fluid-filled, and hyperemic, with mild surrounding fat stranding. No retroperitoneal or mesenteric lymphadenopathy. No evidence of worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture.
